title: Cybersecurity Modernization for a Global Fintech Platform
subtitle: Strengthening FinSage Global’s security posture through AI-driven Zero Trust architecture and automated threat response

client_overview.description: FinSage Global is a rapidly growing fintech company offering cross-border digital payment solutions for consumers and enterprises across Europe, Asia, and North America. With rapid expansion came the challenge of managing large-scale user data securely while complying with evolving international data privacy laws.

challenge.description: As FinSage’s customer base grew, so did the scale and complexity of cybersecurity threats. The company faced:
points: Unauthorized access attempts across user accounts
Inconsistent encryption practices in legacy systems
Compliance risks under GDPR and PSD2
Lack of unified threat monitoring across platforms
challenge.impact: These challenges heightened operational risk and could erode customer trust if not addressed swiftly.

objectives.title: End-to-End Data Protection
objectives.description: Strengthen data security and identity management

objectives.title: Automation
objectives.description: Introduce real-time threat monitoring and automated incident response

solution.description: TasteHub ITelligence deployed a Zero Trust Security Architecture integrated with AI-driven monitoring and automated incident response systems.

key_features.title: AI-Driven Monitoring
key_features.description: Continuous behavioral analytics for proactive threat detection

key_features.title: Zero Trust Model
key_features.description: Never trust, always verify” approach ensuring constant validation

key_features.title: Automated Response
key_features.description: Threat response time reduced via intelligent playbooks

key_features.title: Centralized Dashboard
